hanzi-su-wiki:
載

Значения

Класть, ставить, грузить; помещать, вносить (в список); садиться; ехать

Мнемоника

哉 без рта — элементы копьё 戈 и способность 才 в значении "талант владеть оружием". Талант обращения с телегой 車, умение правильно положить груз и грамотно ехать.

Варианты

载
purpleculture_pinyin:
zài
to carry; to convey; to load; to hold; to fill up; and; also; as well as; simultaneously
нести; передавать; загружать; держать; заполнить; и; также; а также; одновременно

zǎi
to record in writing; to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc); Taiwan pr. [zai4]; year
сделать запись в письменной форме; нести (т.е. опубликовать в газете и т. д.); Тайвань пр. [zai4]; год

heisig_keyword: load | грузить товар, всходить на борт, опубликовать, распространять
heisig_chinese_memo: Here we have a cart laden with a load of dirt travelling to the thanksgiving celebration to create a nice garden for it.
heisig_constituent: load, Thanksgiving, harvest festival, ten, needle, fiesta, car, vehicle
heisig_story: One loads bales on a wagon or cart in preparation for the great Hay Ride that follows the Thanksgiving dinner each year.
myStory: важное как земля (не дерево, а запчасти теслы или еда), машина, охраняемое копьем
Keyword_KANJIDIC: ride, board, get on, place, spread, 10**44
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: ездить, доски, попасть на, место, распространение, 10 ** 44
koohiiStory1: After eating a big Thanksgiving dinner, you have to be careful in the car ride home not to drop a load in your pants.
koohiiStory2: After ´Thanksgiving´ dinner, my girlfriend gave me a BJ on the drive back home. I blew my ´load´ and ´soiled´ the ´car´. But it was LOADS of fun! Please report this story if this makes you feel uncomfortable :).
jp_example_words:
記載(きさい): mention, entry
掲載(けいさい): appearance (e.g. article in paper)
載せる(のせる): to place on (something), to take on board, to give a ride, to let (one) take part, to impose on, to record, to mention, to load (luggage), to publish, to run (an ad)
載る(のる): get on, ride in, board, mount, get up on, be taken in, share in, join, be found in (a dictionary), feel like doing, be mentioned in, be in harmony with, appear (in print), be recorded
jp_readingExamples: 載せる (の.せる), 載る (の.る)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you leave a cross on a drunkard's car it's a sign that you'll publish everything if they try to drive. It's basically the universal symbol of, "We're watching you, and we'll publish what you do, so don't drive drunk."
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Open your newspaper in the morning and you can see what's been published about all the drunkards who didn't pay attention to the crosses on their cars. They were all arrested and their stories were published for all to see.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You need someone to publish all these stories, so you get your cyborg (さい) to do it. It can keep an eye on all the drunkards cars through the special crosses you put on their cars. And the cyborg is a great editor, which is a plus.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture your cyborg, with one of those newsie hats on, publishing stories about all of the bad drunk drivers so they never do it again. It's using its metal and meat arms to publish multiple stories at once.
Ru_Meaning: ride, board, get on, place, spread, 10**44, record, publish
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 戴 (いただく、タイпринимать).

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Here we have a cart laden with a load of dirt traveling to the fiesta to create a nice garden for it.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The inscription from " car ", the sound of " 𢦔 " means taking a car to ride, the original meaning is ride. "Said Wen": "Load, ride (press: "ride") also. From the car 𢦔 sound." Paragraph note: "The rider, the answer. The overwrite is downloaded. The meaning is the same, the extension is that The thing carried is called carry.... It is extended to the shelter of all things carried. For example, in "Poems", "Fan Yangzhou, carry sinking and floating." "The Doctrine of the Mean": "The heaven and the earth hold the load."

Oracle no " load " word, and " steroids " is read " load " represents the implementation, ride, see " steroids ."

Inscriptions from " 𢦔 " from " car ", " 𢦔 " from Ge was sound, then the sound is " contained " sound character; " car " righteous character which indicates a ride. "Early Warring States contained the word of" " 𢦔 " eliminating " Ge ", from only from the car, with " only " as the sound character.

The inscription has five meanings. Represents records, such as Zhongshan Wang Fanghu: "Because of the beauty of the content", "The simple strategy of the content", "Book. "Luogao": "Pi sees merits", Kong Yingda's note: "It is recorded by those who have merits in the group of officials"; it means riding, such as Ejun Qizhou Festival: "Don't carry gold, leather, stride, arrow", "Jiyun ": "Carriage, boats and trucks also transport goods." "poetry. "Xiaoya": "It’s a car ride"; it is also the same pronunciation as " 𩛥 ", which means setting food, such as Ping Ye Jun Cheng’s Cargo Ding: "Ping Ye Jun Cheng’s Carriage Ding ", " Carriage Ding" means cooking food Ding; It also communicates with " cai " and " 𩛥 ", indicating the past and the past, see " 𩛥 ".

" Zai " in bronze inscriptions is also used as a name, such as Li Hou Zai Ge, the weapon of the Warring States Period Yan Cheng Hou, "Historical Records. "The Family of Yan" records the story of Yan Chenggong in the early years of the Warring States Period. Sima Zhen's "Suoyin": "The Chronicles says: "Cheng Hou Ming Zai"

There are many examples in the literature handed down that are similar to the sound of " Zai ". First, from the ancient " 𢦔 " or " only " sound word more common sound the same, so the " load " and the " 𢦔 ", " holy ", " cut ", " before ", " wear " such as General Motors, see each word. Second, from the words " cai " to " steroid ", the ancient sounds belong to the same part, so they are often used in common use. Such as " load ", " hereby " universal, " carrier " also said that age, a load that is one year, "Ya. Release day ":" The carrier, also the age "and then" upload "to make more ancient" hereby "," Spring and Autumn Annals ", saying" this Zilu much mourning, next year there is chaos Qi "," Mencius ", saying" this is hereby fails, Please take it lightly and wait for the coming year. "Now here" means "this year", which means "this year".
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The inscription from " car ", the sound of " 𢦔 " means to ride by car, the original meaning is ride.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「車」，「𢦔」聲，表示以車乘載，本義是乘載。《說文》：「載，乗（按：即『乘』）也。从車𢦔聲。」段注：「乗者，覆也。上覆之則下載之。其義相承，引申之謂所載之物曰載。……引申為凡載物之偁。如《詩》『汎汎楊舟，載沈載浮。』《中庸》：『天地之無不持載』是也。」

　　甲骨文未見「載」字，而「甾」讀作「載」，表示施行、乘載，參見「甾」。

　　金文從「𢦔」從「車」，「𢦔」從戈才聲，音再，是「載」的聲符；「車」為義符，表示乘載。戰國早期「載」字之「𢦔」省去「戈」，從才從車，以「才」為聲符。

　　銘文用義有五。表示記載，如中山王方壺：「因載所美」、「載之簡策」，《書．洛誥》：「丕視功載」，孔穎達注：「視羣臣有功者記載之」；表示乘載，如鄂君啟舟節：「毋載金、革、黽、箭」，《集韻》：「載，舟車運物也」。《詩．小雅》：「其車旣載」；又同音通作「𩛥」，表示設食，如坪夜君成之載鼎：「坪夜君成之載鼎」，「載鼎」即飪食之鼎；又與「才」、「𩛥」通，表示從前、過去，參見「𩛥」。

　　金文「載」還用作人名，如郾侯載戈，即戰國燕成侯的兵器，《史記．燕世家》記有戰國初年燕成公之事，司馬貞《索隱》：「《紀年》云：『成侯名載』。」

　　傳世文獻中與「載」音近通用之例甚多。第一，古籍從「𢦔」或「才」聲的字多音同通用，故「載」又與「𢦔」、「哉」、「裁」、「才」、「戴」等通用，參見各字。第二，從「才」從「甾」之字，古音皆屬之部，故每通用。如「載」、「茲」通用，「載」又表示年歲，一載即一年，《爾雅．釋天》：「載，歲也。」然「載」古籍多作「茲」，《春秋傳》曰「今茲魯多大喪，明年齊有亂」，《孟子》曰「今茲未能，請輕之，以待來年」，「今茲」即「今載」，意為「今年」。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「車」，「𢦔」聲，表示以車乘載，本義是乘載。

  • ⿹ Surround from upper right
    • 哉 [ zāi ] final exclamatory particle

①裝，用交通工具裝：載客。載貨。載重。載體。裝載。滿載而歸。
②充滿：怨聲載道。
③乃，於是(古文裏常用來表示同時做兩個動作)：載歌載舞。
④姓氏。
載體 [ zài tǐ ]: carrier (chemistry); vector (epidemiology); vehicle or medium
①記載，寫在一定的冊頁裏，有鄭重的色彩。［合］登載(新聞、文章等）在報刊上印出)；刊載(在報紙刊物上登載)；記載(把事情寫下來)；附載(附帶記錄)；轉載(報刊上刊登別的報刊上發表過的文章)；連載(連續刊載)；載列(記載)。
②描繪。［例］成功遂事，莫知其狀，圖弗能載，名弗能舉。——《鶡冠子》。
③年。［例］朕在位七十載。——《書·堯典》。［合］載祀(年)。

掲載(けいさい): appearance (e.g. article in paper)
載せる(のせる): to place on (something), to take on board, to give a ride, to let (one) take part, to impose on, to record, to mention, to load (luggage), to publish, to run (an ad)
載る(のる): get on, ride in, board, mount, get up on, be taken in, share in, join, be found in (a dictionary), feel like doing, be mentioned in, be in harmony with, appear (in print), be recorded

金文從「 車 」，「 𢦔 」聲，表示以車乘載，本義是乘載。《說文》：「載，乗（按：即『乘』）也。从車𢦔聲。」段注：「乗者，覆也。上覆之則下載之。其義相承，引申之謂所載之物曰載。……引申為凡載物之偁。如《詩》『汎汎楊舟，載沈載浮。』《中庸》：『天地之無不持載』是也。」 甲骨文未見「 載 」字，而「 甾 」讀作「 載 」，表示施行、乘載，參見「 甾 」。 金文從「 𢦔 」從「 車 」，「 𢦔 」從戈才聲，音再，是「 載 」的聲符；「 車 」為義符，表示乘載。戰國早期「 載 」字之「 𢦔 」省去「 戈 」，從才從車，以「 才 」為聲符。 銘文用義有五。表示記載，如中山王方壺：「因載所美」、「載之簡策」，《書．洛誥》：「丕視功載」，孔穎達注：「視羣臣有功者記載之」；表示乘載，如鄂君啟舟節：「毋載金、革、黽、箭」，《集韻》：「載，舟車運物也」。《詩．小雅》：「其車旣載」；又同音通作「 𩛥 」，表示設食，如坪夜君成之載鼎：「坪夜君成之載鼎」，「載鼎」即飪食之鼎；又與「 才 」、「 𩛥 」通，表示從前、過去，參見「 𩛥 」。 金文「 載 」還用作人名，如郾侯載戈，即戰國燕成侯的兵器，《史記．燕世家》記有戰國初年燕成公之事，司馬貞《索隱》：「《紀年》云：『成侯名載』。」 傳世文獻中與「 載 」音近通用之例甚多。第一，古籍從「 𢦔 」或「 才 」聲的字多音同通用，故「 載 」又與「 𢦔 」、「 哉 」、「 裁 」、「 才 」、「 戴 」等通用，參見各字。第二，從「 才 」從「 甾 」之字，古音皆屬之部，故每通用。如「 載 」、「 茲 」通用，「 載 」又表示年歲，一載即一年，《爾雅．釋天》：「載，歲也。」然「 載 」古籍多作「 茲 」，《春秋傳》曰「今茲魯多大喪，明年齊有亂」，《孟子》曰「今茲未能，請輕之，以待來年」，「今茲」即「今載」，意為「今年」。

Name meaning

zài, zǎi
вм. 载
Radicals: 十, 戈, 車  (cross, drunkard, car)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you leave a cross on a drunkard's car it's a sign that you'll publish everything if they try to drive. It's basically the universal symbol of, "We're watching you, and we'll publish what you do, so don't drive drunk."
Open your newspaper in the morning and you can see what's been published about all the drunkards who didn't pay attention to the crosses on their cars. They were all arrested and their stories were published for all to see.
Reading Mnemonic
You need someone to publish all these stories, so you get your cyborg (さい) to do it. It can keep an eye on all the drunkards cars through the special crosses you put on their cars. And the cyborg is a great editor, which is a plus.
Picture your cyborg, with one of those newsie hats on, publishing stories about all of the bad drunk drivers so they never do it again. It's using its metal and meat arms to publish multiple stories at once.
